description: A measurement for a sample, including its output file(s)

channel.description: for flow, the name of the channel this measurement used

measurement_group_id.description: measurement group id, represents a single logical measurement from a lab that aggregates multiple related samples and files

measurement_id.description: a localized, unique measurement id relating a given sample to one or more files

measurement_name.description: CP/protocol specific name suggested by the labs

reference_sequence.description: This field should be a path to the fasta/gff without the extension, ex. agave://data-sd2e-community/reference/novel-chassis/MG1655 where the references are named MG1655.fa and MG1655.gff

title: Measurement
